de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.cloud

Class Archiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.cloud.Archiver

  • public class Archiver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create an archive file containing selected sensor data files or the storage file which itself contains information about the sensors or the privacy settings and user applications
    Author:
    roehrdor

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • notEncryptedGOSFile

        public static boolean notEncryptedGOSFile(java.io.File file)
        Tests whether the given file is a not encrypted file created by GarmentOS
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the file has been creted by GarmentOS and is not encrypted, false otherwise

      • getFilesInDirectory

        protected static java.util.List<java.io.File> getFilesInDirectory(java.io.File dir)
        Return all files in the given directory and in sub directory
        Parameters:
        dir - the root directory where to start searching
        Returns:
        a list of files contained in the directory or sub directory

      • unpackEncryptedFile

        public static int unpackEncryptedFile(java.lang.String key,
                                      java.io.File inputFile)
        Unpack the encrypted archive
        Parameters:
        key - the key to decrypt the archive file
        inputFile - the inputfile to be decrypted first and then unpacked

      • mergeSensorDataFiles

        protected static boolean mergeSensorDataFiles(java.io.File existent,
                                              java.io.File dataToMerge)
        Merge the two given files
        Parameters:
        existent - the already existent base file, the result file will have the exact same name
        dataToMerge - the new data file to be merged
        Returns:
        true if the merge process has been successfully done, false otherwise

      • unpack

        public static int unpack(java.io.File inputFile)
        Validate and extract the file. This function will return Constants.UNPACK_NO_ERROR if the extraction process terminated successfully. If the file has not been created by GarmentOS the function will return Constants.UNPACK_INVALID_FILE
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the input file to validate and extract
        Returns:
        Constants.UNPACK_NO_ERROR if extraction was successful

      • validateAndChangeHeader

        protected static int validateAndChangeHeader(java.io.File file)
        Validate the given file and check whether is has been created by GarmentOS. If this file has been created by GarmentOS prepare the file for extraction, otherwise return the specific error code.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be validated and probably extracted
        Returns:
        an error code or 0 Constants.UNPACK_NO_ERROR if the file has been successfully validated

      • unpackArchiveFile

        protected static int unpackArchiveFile(java.io.File inputFile)
        Unpack the packed archive file and merge the files as far as possible
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the input file to unpack

      • createArchiveFile

        public static void createArchiveFile(java.io.File outputFile)
        Create a compressed archive file containing all sensor data and the storage file containing the privacy information and sensor settings.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the output file to store the files in

      • createEncryptedArchiveFile

        public static void createEncryptedArchiveFile(java.lang.String key,
                                              java.io.File outputFile)
        Create a compressed and encrypted archive file containing all sensor data and the storage file containing the privacy information and sensor settings. This function call is actually the same as first calling createArchiveFile(java.io.File) and afterwards calling the encryptFile(java.io.File, String) method.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to encrypt the file with
        outputFile - the output file to store the files in

      • encryptFile

        public static void encryptFile(java.io.File fileName,
                               java.lang.String pass)
        Encrypt the given file with the given password
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to encrypt
        pass - the password to use for encryption

      • decryptFile

        public static int decryptFile(java.io.File fileName,
                              java.lang.String pass)
        Decrypt the given file with the given password
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to be decrypted
        pass - the password to use for decryption
